page.title: 16HAILEY AREA -- GENERAL
page.content: {SQUARES 3611 and 3610 Features of the{LANDSCAPE}of the area are Golding's Wood & Hailey Wood which both contain deciduous trees and are on higher land. Embankments have been made to accommodate the A10, which is the major line of{ROAD TRANSPORT}in the area, and its large roundabout. The Galley Hall Public Ho. in Hailey Lane, once owned by Christies, a one- time local brewery, provides the main source of{ENTERTAINMENT. ATTITUDES differ: the younger customers tend to use it on Saturday and Sunday evenings whereas the older customers tend to use it on weekdays during the day. Many customers come from the nearby 100- acre housing estate, or are office-workers from Hoddesdon who come for lunch. (100-acre was formerly an area for horticulture).
